Reviews.Title: Fantastic!
Reviews.Author: Rob Jordan
Reviews.Content: I bought this little gizmo to help aim and focus cctv cameras.  It works great.  The resolution is perfect for aim/focus.  The hand held size is great.  The grip also fits nicely into one of the tool holes on the top step of a ladder, which comes in handy when on top of a 12' ladder and you need to set it down to make some adjustments.  Over all a good device for a great price.  I'm going to get my office to buy one of these for each of our techs since they are so cheap when compared to other cctv monitor handsets.  It doesn't do PTZ or Voltage, but will pass 12vdc to power up a camera if you need.

Reviews.Title: great product for cctv installers
Reviews.Author: jesus
Reviews.Content: I just purchased this product last week starting using it  right away. it works great. I am an installer and i had used a more expensive test Monitor but i didnt like the fact that it works on double AA batteries. this AGP product uses a rechargeble battery pack . its really easy to use. i would give a Five Star if it would come with a BNC to BNC patch cord cable. It would be nice to have a larger display like a 3.5 or a 4.5"

Reviews.Title: works like it is supposed to.
Reviews.Author: thedesideratapoem
Reviews.Content: Only complaint is the neck strap broke in the first 5 minutes of owning & using the gadget & almost let the monitor hit the concrete & possibly have broken it! Broke in the first 5 minutes!? Beware of the neck strap! Other than that it is great & indispensable in my case of installing some video cameras. I can preview the video & adjust the cameras, without having to make a million trips back & forth between the recorder & the cameras.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Francisco Lopez
Reviews.Content: I do entry systems, this has helped me check the operation of cameras before and after installation. Good price and clear picture.

Reviews.Title: All is OK
Reviews.Author: Franklyn Blanco "Cur Job"
Reviews.Content: This product is for my satisfaction, is what I was expecting many thanks. Everything is perfect. I can recommend without problem

Reviews.Title: easy to use
Reviews.Author: Dstealth "Dstealt"
Reviews.Content: After using this product to install 9 CCTV cameras, I must say that I was pleasantly surprised at how well it worked. I had reservations in ordering this inexpensive unit($55), but it worked much better than I anticipated. It exceeded all of my expectations!

Reviews.Title: Better and Cheaper than the similar devive I had been using
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey A. Street
Reviews.Content: Better and Cheaper than the similar device I had been usingThe Lion battery can be recharged and it has ample power and an output to power the camera you are testing

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: T. King
Reviews.Content: I just needed a cheap monitor to test cameras and this does the job perfectly.  It is lightweight and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price.
Reviews.Author: Richard Silberman
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use and practical. Good value for the price. I recommend this for anyone that does periodic / low volume CCTV installation or maintenance.

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: Maxamillion
Reviews.Content: Works well.. It is color, functional, and you can power the camera off it.  Very nice.  I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: perfect tool must have for cctv installer great price
Reviews.Author: Stephen S.
Reviews.Content: cant make it through a week without it. battery last all day on full charge. ive dropped it 10 feet of ladder more than once still works great. wish it had a clip for hanging from ceiling grid.

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: Yorman Antonio Niño Martinez
Reviews.Content: Great product, versatile and practical.Recommended for installations and CCTV cameras to focus on the installation site.Provider recommended, very serious.

Reviews.Title: Really nice...
Reviews.Author: G. Turner
Reviews.Content: I only gave 4 stars because this could have been a better product if it had a reflection reduction cover.VERY hard to see in daylight. BUT having said that... the ease of aiming a cam outside without going up, and down a ladder is well worth it. I bought a Delkin Devices DU2.5 pop up shade, and attached it to this... Makes it much better.

Reviews.Title: works good and fun to have
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: not the best reception ...but its great for what its made for , saves u lots of trips up and down latter & you can get the security camera pointed in the right direction & secure it ..I like to still have a friend on the ground looking at monitor which I connect with a 20' x-tra twist rca wire which I plug in and let him direct the way I aim it, it leaves me more hands for securing camera ...I am only a beginner at this, I have 22 cameras up at this time and this tool is a must for me...so glad I took the chance and shelled out the 55.00 bucks....great toy for tool-men & handypeople

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Reginald Blanchard
Reviews.Content: i received it on time in the mail, hooked it up and it worked just fine for my needs.  This is worth the money and I saved a bundle

Reviews.Title: I'm an installer and THIS IS AWESOME!
Reviews.Author: PaulsLaw
Reviews.Content: Wish I would have got one of these 2yrs ago when I started out installing CCTVs!  It made the last install SO MUCH SIMPLER having the cameras in line before you even hook up the DVR.SAVE MUCH LADDER TIME!If you've been working with CCTVs you really need one of these!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Value Buyer
Reviews.Content: This product saves a lot of time and aggravation when setting up your security cameras.  Both focus and position can be set right at the camera rather than trying to run back and forth between the camera location and the monitor.  If you have security cameras, I suggest you invest in this invaluable little tool.

Reviews.Title: inexpensive to accomplish one time need
Reviews.Author: C. W. Larimer "Dragonslayer"
Reviews.Content: Not top quality but does fill the need to adjust manual zoom & focus cameras without running back and forth to the monitor and limited to camera viewing only. Quality handhelds are 3 or 4 times more and give you cable testing capibility. This is one of those that needed one time use and you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Worth the price!
Reviews.Author: Devilz
Reviews.Content: Great picture, easy to use and good battery life. I would have liked to see the unit support AA rechargeable batteries rather than a proprietary battery. This product is well worth the price!

Reviews.Title: Great device for CCTV installation.
Reviews.Author: G. Brown "GeeBee"
Reviews.Content: Excellent LCD monitor for CCTV camera installation. It's amazing how cheaply they can make these products nowadays. I have dropped mine, scratched it up and generally mistreated the handheld device and it still works. The screen could be a little bigger, but so would be the price so I won't fault the manufacturers on that.

Reviews.Title: If you use a security camera you need this dcent price
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: As much as I use a security camera this make it PURE simple ad saves a lot of time see for your self with Amazon prime.

Reviews.Title: Works great and can't beat the price
Reviews.Author: Nate
Reviews.Content: I bought this because I'm redoing a 16 camera system at my business.  This has made the process much easier and for the price I'm very happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: boss loves it
Reviews.Author: amazonisthebomb
Reviews.Content: my boss told me to order a monitor to test and prefocus cameras.Read the reviews, and agree for the money it is great.We wish the screen was a little bigger though.Only 2.5 inches...Would be willing to pay a little more for a bigger screen with same design....

Reviews.Title: Complain
Reviews.Author: Moussa Younes
Reviews.Content: I bought this item a month ago. It worked for a few days, later it stopped working. It is the worst tester I have used. I believe the seller does not provide warranty.

Reviews.Title: Great!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: hoosier
Reviews.Content: This handheld works great has all of the accessories you need to setup a cameras. Clear display and light weight.

Reviews.Title: Works as expected
Reviews.Author: tsymyn
Reviews.Content: It's fantastic to have an option for an economical camera viewer to set up your own cameras.  I would think I pro would go with a higher-end option.  Viewing angles are a little limited, but I wasn't expecting AMOLED or IPS on the screen, either.  Battery life seems adequate.  I'm not sure where to get a replacement battery - it looks like a cell phone battery but the contacts are different and the only identifying information is from the manufacturer of the viewer itself.Mine arrived with the screen mis-installed in the unit: it was at an angle to the window in the case and you couldn't see all of the screen.  Not a big deal for me - I just opened it up, seated the screen properly, and reassembled.

Reviews.Title: Small screen, but serves the purpose.
Reviews.Author: Level1
Reviews.Content: Screen is quite small, but very portable when climbing a ladder for camera setup.Built-in battery lasts forever and a day.Perfect for setting up cameras without having to climb up and down a ladder to check camera view on monitor.Nice unit and worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: very nice
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: this is very nice to be able to be at the camra to beable to a just. good picture as well.

Reviews.Title: Worked great!
Reviews.Author: Mark S Bogannan
Reviews.Content: Quailty good!Works well!Would buy again!Makes the job so much easier, less running around up and down ladders!

Reviews.Title: feel light and of poor quality....
Reviews.Author: Lagenorhincus
Reviews.Content: feel light and of poor quality but gets the job done!It took me 1mn to find out how to connect it to the camera but afterthat everything worked just fine. Good image quality and became veryfast indispensable to set up and adjust my surveillance system.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: Rsecurity
Reviews.Content: I purchased this handheld monitor and it is not worth a dime.  The product is made from cheap plastic and after a few applications the unit does not work anymore.  The battery that came with the unit I purchased did not work, so I purchased another battery and still the unit only powers a camera when it is plugged into an AC outlet--which defeats the purpose.  I never write reviews, but since I have to purchase another unit and I came across this item, I feel I should warn anyone who is considering purchasing this monitor.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME
Reviews.Author: EDWARD E HARMON
Reviews.Content: PERFECT !!!!!! Very useful when putting up security cameras and would recommend it.  Saves time and you do not have to yell back and fourth trying to position the cameras right while up on a ladder.

Reviews.Title: I'm not to sure this was necessary.
Reviews.Author: TM
Reviews.Content: I think this is more of a gadget thing you want to say you have more than you really need. But it works as described.

ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in Li battery; Video-in terminal and DC power supply
Each 4 hours recharge durables 6~7 work hours
High image resolution monitor enable to show clear image Long work time
Hand-hold design for professionals.Easy operation without taking off gloves speeds your works
It's convenient for user to check camera condition and correct direction of camera, so to make installation and repairing easier.
ProductInfo.Name: Brand New 2.5" Color TFT LCD Monitor Handheld Surveillance CCTV Camera Test Detector
